historical:
Prior Codifications

Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

Editor's Notes

Former § 29-913 has been recodified as § 29A-913.

DC CODE § 29-913

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Each member of an association shall have only one vote, except as may be altered in the articles or bylaws for:
Allocation of votes in a cooperative housing association proportionate to the share of ownership in the association or on the basis of one vote for each unit.
A voting agreement or other device to evade the requirements of this section shall not be enforceable.
